job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Our client is the next big thing. They're in stealth mode, backed by two household-name billionaires and focused on the war on cancer.


You will work with a team of machine learning scientists and engineers to develop and deploy AI-based biomarkers to support the personalization of cancer therapy. You will work closely with our engineering team to build production-grade APIs and serving models that integrate with our clinical product.


Minimum Qualifications:

  • BS or MS in an AI-related field (CS, EE, Stats, etc.) or substantial development experience in AI.
  • Strong programming skills, competitive in ACM-ICPC or other competitions.
  • Substantial experience with Python, and deep learning libraries such as PyTorch or Tensorflow
  • Experience in implementing high-performance and large-scale deep learning systems.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Full time industry experience in deep learning research/product.
  • Experience mentoring and advising other engineers
